abort.one_instance_allowed: You may have only one instance of Leaf Spy installed, and you appear to have installed one already.

create_entry.default:
Open the LeafSpy app, go to `'Menu'` -> `'Settings'`.
 - Set `'Units'` to `'Â°C'`.
 - Enable `'Convert Outside Temperatures'`.
 - Scroll down to the `'Server'` section. Change the following settings:
 - `'Enable'`: On
 - `'Send Interval'`: Whatever frequency you prefer.
 - `'ID'`: Whatever name you prefer for the `device_tracker` entity. `'Leaf'` is fine.'`
 - `'PW'`: {secret}
 - `'Http://'` or `'Https://'`: Depends on your Home Assistant installation.
 - `'URL'`: {url}
   - _(**Do not** include the http or https prefix in the URL field.)_

user.description: Are you sure you want to set up LeafSpy?
user.title: Set up LeafSpy
